ygData.subject: RE: Gob Pets in Oasis?
ygData.msgSnippet: In fact it was Brian Hook, formerly of Quake 3 fame who ran that event.  The thing that disgusts me is that that wizard told everyone that the Archon dropped
ygData.messageBody:
In fact it was Brian Hook, formerly of Quake 3 fame who ran that event. The
thing that disgusts me is that that wizard told everyone that the Archon
dropped nothing. It took everyone in the zone to deal with the mob's and
the Archon, and this guy not only has the gall to keep the loot all to
himself, but also to lie about what he got. Gives all wizards a bad name,
oh, wait, they already have that, don't they.

Telon Stormwarden
28th level ranger on E'ci

> ----------
> From: Diina, David[SMTP:DDiina@...]
> Reply To: EQCheats@onelist.com
> Sent: Thursday, August 05, 1999 3:56 PM
> To: EQCheats@onelist.com
> Subject: RE: [EQCheats] Gob Pets in Oasis?
>
> From: "Diina, David" <DDiina@...>
>
> Speaking of GM organized events....the other day on my server (Xegony) a
> GM
> took over the Tae Archeon in Cazic Thule.....he was a lvl 50 Wizard and
> was
> casting Ice Comet.....he killed everybody...no one lost any exp though
> which
> was cool....the GM did finally fall to a Lvl 50 Mage named Hast who hangs
> out in CT actually helping people!!! That's right a lvl 50 who helps
> people.....anyways Hast told me he got a FULL set of rubicite armor and a
> shiny mettalic robe off the GM controlled Tae Archeon.....WOW is all I
> could
> say
>
> Brennin Lightblade
> LVL 33 Warrior
> Protectors of Light
>
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Lanadina the Magician [mailto:lanadina@...]
> Sent: Thursday, August 05, 1999 1:40 PM
> To: EQCheats@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [EQCheats] Gob Pets in Oasis?
>
> From: "Lanadina the Magician" <lanadina@...>
>
> They are gone now. Apparently, the EXP was TOO easy. They
> were only hitting
> for 40 if that, and I could actually see my experience bar
> moving in level
> 30 (which is sometimes impossible to see since its a barrier
> level).
>
> Alas, I went back to Oasis AND Lake Rathe, and the doggies
> are now gone.
>
> Lana
>
>
> ----Original Message Follows----
> From: Sean.Clark@...
> Reply-To: EQCheats@onelist.com
> To: EQCheats@onelist.com
> Subject: [EQCheats] Gob Pets in Oasis?
> Date: Thu, 5 Aug 1999 11:12:58 -0600
>
> From: Sean.Clark@...
>
> I just saw a post on one of the Stratics boards concerning
> an over-run of
> Aqua Goblin Pets in Oasis....apparently the wolves are all
> over the place
> for the last few days and giving very easy EXP.
> Anybody have any info on this to share???
>
